name: Wee Tanks!
description:
Welcome to the world of Wee Tanks!

Wee Tanks! is the game where you control a blue tank and destroy hundreds of enemy tanks across many maps and game modes!

Play the campaign with 100 missions, on multiple difficulties



The official campaign (more campaigns to come!) contains 100 missions, with boss battles, secret missions, and more.

Select one of the four difficulties suited for your playstyle.. toddler mode? or adult mode? Your pick!

Each mission has a diverse amount of enemy tanks you have to fight through with each a different mission layout.
But beware: some missions are very difficult! You might need to lower the difficulty on some...

Available to play with 4 friends locally!

Create your own campaigns



Within Wee Tanks is an advanced, powerful map editor in which you can create your own campaigns. You can even customize and create a tank of your own!
Test, play, and share your campaign with everyone using the built-in campaign browser.

Survival mode



Can you survive the endless horde of enemy tanks coming for you? Play a never-before-seen survival mode on many expansive and unique maps, complete with their own theme!

Use your points to upgrade your tank or to place turrets that shoot the enemy tanks for you!

Unlockables


By playing Wee Tanks you can get achievements, and with these achievements, you unlock all sorts of cool stuff.
Like new tank skins, tank tracks, bullet colors, or new objects and enemies to place in the map editor!

To get achievements and unlock new items, you need to create an account in Wee Tanks! (This way your data will be synced with your account, so there is no risk of losing your progress)

Future plans


The development of Wee Tanks is far from over, but all the main features are present in the current version.


Our plans for the future of Wee Tanks:
  • Multiplayer (PvP, PvE, play each other maps, and more!)
  • More side campaigns, with new tanks and mechanics/physics
  • Improved Survival, with even more types of enemies, more upgrades, and more maps to choose from!
  • We would love to hear from you what you would like to see in Wee Tanks
